meanings.definition: To put new shoes on (a horse)
meanings.sent1: The blacksmith is reshoeing the horse.
meanings.sent2: I will reshoe the horse before the race.
meanings.sent3: The horse laughed at the idea of reshoeing itself.
meanings.sent4: Reshoeing the horse is like giving it a fresh start.
meanings.sent5: With skilled hands, the blacksmith carefully reshoe the horse.

meanings.definition: The act of replacing shoes on (a horse)
meanings.sent1: Reshoeing can improve a horse's performance.
meanings.sent2: The reshoeing of the horse was necessary after the long journey.
meanings.sent3: The horse's reshoeing made it the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The reshoeing process is crucial for the horse's comfort.
meanings.sent5: A proper reshoeing ensures the horse's well-being and agility.
